title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, Docker; pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package adding Ollama LLM & embeddings integrations.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive chat, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints exposing Ollama chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; typed requests/responses, tokio async.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete using Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot that answers questions via Ollama; mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot streaming Ollama responses in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.

title: ollama-nvidia-jetson
summary: Dockerfile & scripts to run Ollama on NVIDIA Jetson devices.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Lightweight Rust CLI for Ollama with TUI dashboard.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama generators & embedders.
